text: Alexandre Bardinon (born 9 May 2002) is a Swiss racing driver from France currently racing for Van Amersfoort Racing in the Euroformula Open Championship. ==Career== ===2018=== In 2018 Bardion started his racing career as he drove in the French GT4 Cup for M Racing - YMR where he achieved one podium.https://south.gt4series.com/fr_fr/news/211/le-yvan-muller-racing- annonce-les-equipages-de-ses-deux-mercedes-amg-gt4 He also raced in V de V Challenge Monoplace for Formula Motorsport where he once again achieved one podium finish.https://vdev.fr/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/R%C3%A8glement- Sportif-et-Technique-Challenge-Monoplace-V-de-V-VdeV_2018-VF1-1.pdf ===Formula Regional European Championship=== In 2019, Bardinon signed with Mas du Clos racing for the race at Vallelunga where he finished 13th and 12th respective at both rounds. He then made the switch the VAR for the remaining rounds with the highest finish of 9th at the Hungaroring. He finished the season last with 5 points.http://www.f3regional.com/DRIVER/5/BARDINON%20ALEXANDRE ===Euroformula Open Championship=== Bardinon will race for Van Amersfoort Racing alongside the Estner brothers Sebastian and Andreas in 2020.http://www.formulascout.com/sebastian-estner-van-amersfoort- euroformula/60107 ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" !
